originalText.text: Daniel Rubinoff emailed me with a low end quote, so I booked him. An hour past the window, I call for an ETA and he tells me a woman named Linda (I don‚Äôt know anyone named Linda) has cancelled my appointment. I‚Äôm angry, but I reschedule for the next day.  I text him 30 min before the new appointment time to confirm, he says he‚Äôs on his way. He never showed up, and turned off his phone. In the end I called Dr. Sofa instead. They were more expensive, but it was worth it. Daniel at Couch Dr was a waste of my time.

originalText.text:
Would give this company ZERO stars if I could! This Company is a Straight up scam! The stated address for their "show room" is bogus! wasted time and money to find  non commercial  space with security sayingbthis has been a SCAM address for years!  No one ever answers the phone, and the mailbox is constantly full, unable to receive messages.

Repeated calls get you a text about being busy, but then subsequent texts go completely ignored.   All I have seen are excuses in replies. :Driver was injured" Every negative review is "sabotage from competitors " But when contacting numbers YOUatvthis company publish, there is never an answer! suspicious! talking to  someone at a number I found on Google has yet more excuses about vacations and appointments at an an address verified to be bogus.

please don't waste time with this blatant fraud !

Edit:  I made my I itiak quote over 5 months ago. Today, A one sentence Response Appears, like a wild Pok√©mon. "Fake Review Posted By Competitors..." Funny that, it seem like every negative review you receive has the same dismissal. How can anyone compete with a phantom business that does not exist?.

Waste your time and money if you wish, but I wouldn't if I knew then what I know now.

originalText.text: A gentleman called Lou from NY furniture doctor came to my home to look at the furniture to refinish. Gave him a check for the job after I ended up in the hospital cause I am disabled and called him to let him know and sad when I came back out of the hospital can you refund me the money he said no had to buy the material after that the person that was supposed to refinish my furniture, called me and wanted to know when he could do the job so I told him Lou has the material for the job and gentleman told me no he doesn‚Äôt. I supply my own material. I just want to know why this guy Lou from New York furniture  doctor lied to me and did not work in the back of the posit that I gave him at the wall. He doesn‚Äôt do anything for you. I think this company is the worst company I ever came across.

originalText.text: Incredibly responsive & helpful. Reasonable cost and traveled out to Providence, RI! Dimitri was a true professional and finished the job in around 3hours alone! Thank you.
